title: [Question]C MARKS FOR GRADES CUT OFF for S grade
content: Since we have lab exams and all.... how much do we have to get to score S grade

comments.body: Assuming an ideal case, (no relative) 108 out of 120.
107/1.2 is 89.167 which will be scaled up to 90 (S grade) idk why people aren't aware of rounding off
anything above x.5 gets rounded to x+1 and not the way you've stated fam
For people downvoting hear me dumbass people they scale up things even if u have the decimal <5 plz check your facts
